Mapbox Maps SDK for Android 6.1.3 Reference

Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.OnCameraChangeListener
    Replaced by MapboxMap.OnCameraMoveStartedListener, MapboxMap.OnCameraMoveListener and MapboxMap.OnCameraIdleListener. The order in which the deprecated onCameraChange method will be called in relation to the methods in the new camera change listeners is undefined.
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.OnScrollListener
    Use MapboxMap.OnMoveListener instead.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.BaseMarkerViewOptions
    Use a SymbolLayer instead. An example of converting Android SDK views to be used as a symbol see https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-native/blob/68f32bc104422207c64da8d90e8411b138d87f04/platform/android/MapboxGLAndroidSDKTestApp/src/main/java/com/mapbox/mapboxsdk/testapp/activity/style/SymbolGeneratorActivity.java
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.MarkerViewAdapter
    Use a SymbolLayer instead. An example of converting Android SDK views to be used as a symbol see https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-native/blob/68f32bc104422207c64da8d90e8411b138d87f04/platform/android/MapboxGLAndroidSDKTestApp/src/main/java/com/mapbox/mapboxsdk/testapp/activity/style/SymbolGeneratorActivity.java
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.MarkerView
    Use a SymbolLayer instead. An example of converting Android SDK views to be used as a symbol see https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-native/blob/68f32bc104422207c64da8d90e8411b138d87f04/platform/android/MapboxGLAndroidSDKTestApp/src/main/java/com/mapbox/mapboxsdk/testapp/activity/style/SymbolGeneratorActivity.java
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.MarkerViewManager
    Use a SymbolLayer instead. An example of converting Android SDK views to be used as a symbol see https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-native/blob/68f32bc104422207c64da8d90e8411b138d87f04/platform/android/MapboxGLAndroidSDKTestApp/src/main/java/com/mapbox/mapboxsdk/testapp/activity/style/SymbolGeneratorActivity.java
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.MarkerViewOptions
    Use a SymbolLayer instead. An example of converting Android SDK views to be used as a symbol see https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-native/blob/68f32bc104422207c64da8d90e8411b138d87f04/platform/android/MapboxGLAndroidSDKTestApp/src/main/java/com/mapbox/mapboxsdk/testapp/activity/style/SymbolGeneratorActivity.java
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.addMarker(BaseMarkerViewOptions)
    Use a SymbolLayer instead. An example of converting Android SDK views to be used as a symbol see https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-native/blob/68f32bc104422207c64da8d90e8411b138d87f04/platform/android/MapboxGLAndroidSDKTestApp/src/main/java/com/mapbox/mapboxsdk/testapp/activity/style/SymbolGeneratorActivity.java
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.addMarker(BaseMarkerViewOptions, MarkerViewManager.OnMarkerViewAddedListener)
    Use a SymbolLayer instead. An example of converting Android SDK views to be used as a symbol see https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-native/blob/68f32bc104422207c64da8d90e8411b138d87f04/platform/android/MapboxGLAndroidSDKTestApp/src/main/java/com/mapbox/mapboxsdk/testapp/activity/style/SymbolGeneratorActivity.java
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.addMarkerViews(List<? extends BaseMarkerViewOptions>)
    Use a SymbolLayer instead. An example of converting Android SDK views to be used as a symbol see https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-native/blob/68f32bc104422207c64da8d90e8411b138d87f04/platform/android/MapboxGLAndroidSDKTestApp/src/main/java/com/mapbox/mapboxsdk/testapp/activity/style/SymbolGeneratorActivity.java
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.getMarkerViewsInRect(RectF)
    Use a SymbolLayer instead. An example of converting Android SDK views to be used as a symbol see https://github.com/mapbox/mapbox-gl-native/blob/68f32bc104422207c64da8d90e8411b138d87f04/platform/android/MapboxGLAndroidSDKTestApp/src/main/java/com/mapbox/mapboxsdk/testapp/activity/style/SymbolGeneratorActivity.java
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.setOnCameraChangeListener(MapboxMap.OnCameraChangeListener)
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.setOnCameraIdleListener(MapboxMap.OnCameraIdleListener)
    use MapboxMap.addOnCameraIdleListener(OnCameraIdleListener) and MapboxMap.removeOnCameraIdleListener(OnCameraIdleListener) instead
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.setOnCameraMoveCancelListener(MapboxMap.OnCameraMoveCanceledListener)
    use MapboxMap.addOnCameraMoveCancelListener(OnCameraMoveCanceledListener) and MapboxMap.removeOnCameraMoveCancelListener(OnCameraMoveCanceledListener) instead
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.setOnCameraMoveListener(MapboxMap.OnCameraMoveListener)
    use MapboxMap.addOnCameraMoveListener(OnCameraMoveListener) and MapboxMap.removeOnCameraMoveListener(OnCameraMoveListener)instead
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.setOnCameraMoveStartedListener(MapboxMap.OnCameraMoveStartedListener)
    use MapboxMap.addOnCameraMoveStartedListener(OnCameraMoveStartedListener) and MapboxMap.removeOnCameraMoveStartedListener(OnCameraMoveStartedListener) instead
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.setOnFlingListener(MapboxMap.OnFlingListener)
    Use MapboxMap.addOnFlingListener(OnFlingListener) instead.
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.setOnMapClickListener(MapboxMap.OnMapClickListener)
    Use MapboxMap.addOnMapClickListener(OnMapClickListener) instead.
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.setOnMapLongClickListener(MapboxMap.OnMapLongClickListener)
    Use MapboxMap.addOnMapLongClickListener(OnMapLongClickListener) instead.
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.setOnScrollListener(MapboxMap.OnScrollListener)
    Use MapboxMap.addOnScrollListener(OnScrollListener) instead.
